original_text: But Barzillai was a very old man, 80 years old. He had taken care of David when David was living in Mahanaim. He had helped David with many gifts, because he was a very rich man.
korean_text: 바르실래는 매우 늙어 나이가 팔십 세라 그는 큰 부자이므로 왕이 마하나임에 머물 때에 그가 왕을 공궤하였더라

sentences.original_text: But Barzillai was a very old man
He had taken care of David
when David was living in Mahanaim
He had helped David with many gifts
because he was a very rich man
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 매우 부유한 사람이었기 때문입니다
